}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== SATA 3.0 is muxed with Eth1
JTAG is available for both processors and the CPLD.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' LS1021A @1.0GHz :Duad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) *Memory: 1.5GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Storage: 128MB (QSPI NOR) Flash, SATA 3.0, :SD/SDHC/MMC card (max.32GB) slot *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet (2x WAN, 4x LAN) *Power Source: DC Jack 12V, 5A or 802.3af PoE via Eth3
